title: Favorite Movie Genre
short_secs: What is your preferred movie genre?
description: Share your favorite movie genre and see how it compares to others.

title: Technology Trends
short_secs: Which emerging technology excites you the most?
description: Express your enthusiasm for the latest technological advancements.

title: Fitness Habits
short_secs: How often do you exercise in a week?
description: Share your weekly exercise routine and learn about others' fitness habits.

title: Environmental Concerns
short_secs: Which environmental issue concerns you the most?
description: Voice your concerns about environmental issues and explore common perspectives.

title: Remote Work Experience
short_secs: How satisfied are you with remote work?
description: Share your experiences with remote work and gauge overall satisfaction.

title: Travel Preferences
short_secs: What is your preferred mode of transportation when traveling?
description: Discuss your travel preferences and discover popular transportation choices.

title: Social Media Usage
short_secs: How many hours do you spend on social media daily?
description: Share your social media habits and see how they compare to others.

title: Reading Habits
short_secs: How many books do you read in a month?
description: Discuss your reading habits and explore a variety of book consumption patterns.

title: Healthy Eating
short_secs: How often do you include fruits and vegetables in your diet?
description: Share insights into your dietary habits and learn about others' approaches to healthy eating.

title: Music Preferences
short_secs: Which music genre do you enjoy the most?
description: Discover and discuss music preferences to find common ground with fellow participants.
